name: Dragonxy
description:
A game made for Shmupjam 1.

You are in a spaceship and suddenly you are attacked by hordes of dragons. You need to survive the hordes with upgrades you get and kill the two-headed boss dragon.

Move with wasd / arrows and shoot with mouse.

I made this game in hurry and didn't have much time for playtesting, so sorry for bugs etc. I may do bug fixes and updates in the future.

Thanks to Jokuihanvaan who made the music.
